AJ-R.BK.summary: A.J. Plast Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and exports plastic films and scrap products in Thailand and internationally. It offers biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET), biaxially oriented polyamide (BOPA), biaxially oriented poly lactic acid (BOPLA), and cast polypropylene (CPP) films, as well as metallized BOPP, BOPET, BOPA, BOPLA, and CPP films; and Krystalox and Krystalent films. The company's products are primarily used in packing, industrial, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJ.BK.summary: A.J. Plast Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and exports plastic films and scrap products in Thailand and internationally. It offers biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET), biaxially oriented polyamide (BOPA), biaxially oriented poly lactic acid (BOPLA), and cast polypropylene (CPP) films, as well as metallized BOPP, BOPET, BOPA, BOPLA, and CPP films; and Krystalox and Krystalent films. The company's products are primarily used in packing, industrial, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJL1.SG.summary: A.J. Plast Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and exports plastic films and scrap products in Thailand and internationally. It offers biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET), biaxially oriented polyamide (BOPA), biaxially oriented poly lactic acid (BOPLA), and cast polypropylene (CPP) films, as well as metallized BOPP, BOPET, BOPA, BOPLA, and CPP films; and Krystalox and Krystalent films. The company's products are primarily used in packing, industrial, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BGC-R.BK.long_name: BG Container Glass Public Company Limited
BGC-R.BK.summary: BG Container Glass Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes glass packaging containers and bottles in Thailand. It also generates and distributes electricity from solar power. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Thanyaburi, Thailand. BG Container Glass Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Glass Public Company Limited.

CSC-R.BK.summary: Crown Seal Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes crowns and caps for bottles in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Manufacture and Sale of Caps; and Hire of Printing Sheets for Can segments. The company's products include crowns, pilfer-proof, Maxi crown, Maxi, Maxi-PG, plastic, and composite caps, which are used as container seals for various drinks, such as carbonated drinks, soy milk drinks, beers, soda water and energy drinks, fruit juices, liquors, chicken essences, bird's nests, and medical supplies, etc.; hand-crowners; and Maxi crimping machines. It also provides coating and printing services on steel plates and aluminum sheets. Crown Seal Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Thanyaburi, Thailand.

CSC.BK.summary: Crown Seal Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes crowns and caps for bottles in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Manufacture and Sale of Caps; and Hire of Printing Sheets for Can segments. The company's products include crowns, pilfer-proof, Maxi crown, Maxi, Maxi-PG, plastic, and composite caps, which are used as container seals for various drinks, such as carbonated drinks, soy milk drinks, beers, soda water and energy drinks, fruit juices, liquors, chicken essences, bird's nests, and medical supplies, etc.; hand-crowners; and Maxi crimping machines. It also provides coating and printing services on steel plates and aluminum sheets. Crown Seal Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Thanyaburi, Thailand.

GLOCON-R.BK.summary: Global Consumer Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic packaging products primarily in Thailand. It offers flexible packaging products, such as roll-film rolls, enter seals, die cut bags, center seals, 3 side seals, zipper bags, and stand up zipper pouches for various types of consumer products; plastic trays and other plastic products; and polyethylene terephthalate bottles for consumer products. The company also provides rental service in shopping mall and restaurant equipment rental service; operates quick services restaurants under the A&W name; and manufactures and sells frozen foods, ready meals, and seafood and vegetable products. In addition, it is involved in the network marketing, trading, and distribution of food packaging businesses. The company was formerly known as NPPG (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Global Consumer Public Company Limited in October 2019. Global Consumer Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GLOCON.BK.summary: Global Consumer Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic packaging products primarily in Thailand. It offers flexible packaging products, such as roll-film rolls, enter seals, die cut bags, center seals, 3 side seals, zipper bags, and stand up zipper pouches for various types of consumer products; plastic trays and other plastic products; and polyethylene terephthalate bottles for consumer products. The company also provides rental service in shopping mall and restaurant equipment rental service; operates quick services restaurants under the A&W name; and manufactures and sells frozen foods, ready meals, and seafood and vegetable products. In addition, it is involved in the network marketing, trading, and distribution of food packaging businesses. The company was formerly known as NPPG (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Global Consumer Public Company Limited in October 2019. Global Consumer Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MBAX-R.BK.summary: Multibax Public Company Limited manufactures and sells polymer bags in Thailand. It offers polyethylene bags for food and freezer, zipper, produce, fresh, trash, bin liner, and degradable use. The company also provides bio polymer resins. Multibax Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

MBAX.BK.summary: Multibax Public Company Limited manufactures and sells polymer bags in Thailand. It offers polyethylene bags for food and freezer, zipper, produce, fresh, trash, bin liner, and degradable use. The company also provides bio polymer resins. Multibax Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

NEP-R.BK.long_name: NEP Realty and Industry Public Company Limited
NEP-R.BK.summary: NEP Realty and Industry Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of plastic packaging products in Thailand. It is also involved in the investment business. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PDG-R.BK.summary: Prodigy Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET) packaging products in Thailand. It offers PET bottles for drinking water, juices, vegetable oils, seasoning sauces, preform, and other packaging products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

PDG.BK.summary: Prodigy Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET) packaging products in Thailand. It offers PET bottles for drinking water, juices, vegetable oils, seasoning sauces, preform, and other packaging products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

PJW-R.BK.summary: Panjawattana Plastic Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products for consumer products, agro chemicals, automotive parts, lubricants, and fresh and yoghurt milk in Thailand and China. The company operates through Plant - Samuthsakhon, Plant - Chonburi, Plant - Bangkok, Plant - Tianjin (China), Plant - Jiangsu (China), and Business Trading segments. It also trades in lid and plastic resins; and provides service to check the amount/standards of various goods and inspect measurement tools. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PJW.BK.summary: Panjawattana Plastic Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products for consumer products, agro chemicals, automotive parts, lubricants, and fresh and yoghurt milk in Thailand and China. The company operates through Plant - Samuthsakhon, Plant - Chonburi, Plant - Bangkok, Plant - Tianjin (China), Plant - Jiangsu (China), and Business Trading segments. It also trades in lid and plastic resins; and provides service to check the amount/standards of various goods and inspect measurement tools. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCGP-R.BK.summary: SCG Packaging Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells packaging, pulp, and printing and writing paper products in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates in Integrated Packaging Chain and Fibrous Chain segments. It offers corrugated containers, retail display packaging products, and flexible and rigid packaging products; packaging paper, paper grocery bags, and industrial bags; and dissolving pulp and food containers. The company also provides fiber-based, performance, and polymer packaging products; packaging design services; and wastepaper collection services. In addition, it engages in the marketing and event, energy and utilities, asset and intellectual property management, and forestry businesses. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. SCG Packaging Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Siam Cement Public Company Limited.

SCGP.BK.summary: SCG Packaging Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells packaging, pulp, and printing and writing paper products in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates in Integrated Packaging Chain and Fibrous Chain segments. It offers corrugated containers, retail display packaging products, and flexible and rigid packaging products; packaging paper, paper grocery bags, and industrial bags; and dissolving pulp and food containers. The company also provides fiber-based, performance, and polymer packaging products; packaging design services; and wastepaper collection services. In addition, it engages in the marketing and event, energy and utilities, asset and intellectual property management, and forestry businesses. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. SCG Packaging Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Siam Cement Public Company Limited.

SFLEX-R.BK.summary: Starflex Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes flexible packaging in Thailand. It offers packaging products for food and non-food. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SFLEX.BK.summary: Starflex Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes flexible packaging in Thailand. It offers packaging products for food and non-food. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SPACK-R.BK.long_name: S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited
SPACK-R.BK.summary: S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells corrugated and duplex board packaging products in Thailand. It also engages in the offset printing business. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand. S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Oji Holdings Corporation Company Limited.

SPACK.BK.long_name: S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited
SPACK.BK.summary: S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells corrugated and duplex board packaging products in Thailand. It also engages in the offset printing business. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand. S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Oji Holdings Corporation Company Limited.

TCOAT-R.BK.long_name: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited
TCOAT-R.BK.summary: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic sacks and beads in Thailand. It also exports its products. Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Prachinburi, Thailand.

TCOAT.BK.long_name: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited
TCOAT.BK.summary: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic sacks and beads in Thailand. It also exports its products. Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Prachinburi, Thailand.

TFI-R.BK.long_name: Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited
TFI-R.BK.summary: Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells packaging films in Thailand, Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It offers BOPP, CPP, PET, and metalized films for use in printing, lamination, and adhesive tapes. The company was formerly known as TFI Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited in July 2012. Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

THIP-R.BK.summary: Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic products in Thailand. It offers a drinking straws, zipper and slider bags, general bags, cling wraps, zip profiles, and body puffs; and compostable products comprising paper and bio straws, bio zipper bags, bio shopping bags, bio t-shirt bag, and bio garbage bag on roll. The company sells its products under the Sun Products, Kitchen Neat, Fresh & Fresh, Zipsolution, Sun Bio, and Sun Mum brands. The company was formerly known as Blowtech (Thailand) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited in 1994. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand. Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sunflower Company Limited.

THIP.BK.summary: Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic products in Thailand. It offers a drinking straws, zipper and slider bags, general bags, cling wraps, zip profiles, and body puffs; and compostable products comprising paper and bio straws, bio zipper bags, bio shopping bags, bio t-shirt bag, and bio garbage bag on roll. The company sells its products under the Sun Products, Kitchen Neat, Fresh & Fresh, Zipsolution, Sun Bio, and Sun Mum brands. The company was formerly known as Blowtech (Thailand) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited in 1994. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand. Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sunflower Company Limited.

TMD-R.BK.long_name: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited
TMD-R.BK.summary: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal drums in Thailand. The company offers steel and plastic drums for the storage and transportation of lubricant oils, petrochemicals, chemicals, agriculture products, food products, and other products; polyethylene terepthalate plastic bottles and preforms; and polypropylene corrugated sheets to the drinking water and beverage companies. It is also involved in the rental of Lake Rajada office complex with a total leasing space of 51,730 square meters located in the business district on Rachadapisek road, Thailand, as well as trading business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMD.BK.long_name: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited
TMD.BK.summary: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal drums in Thailand. The company offers steel and plastic drums for the storage and transportation of lubricant oils, petrochemicals, chemicals, agriculture products, food products, and other products; polyethylene terepthalate plastic bottles and preforms; and polypropylene corrugated sheets to the drinking water and beverage companies. It is also involved in the rental of Lake Rajada office complex with a total leasing space of 51,730 square meters located in the business district on Rachadapisek road, Thailand, as well as trading business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOPP-R.BK.summary: Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic films, stickers, laminate tubes, and packaging products in Thailand. The company offers plastic films, such as POF shrink films, skin vacuum films, cast polypropylene (CPP) films, metallized films, stretch films, blown linear low density polypropylene films, CPP breathable films, films for lamination, and protection films, as well as oriented polypropylene heat sealable films. It also provides CPP peels for PP cups, such as jelly, pudding, and fruit dessert cups; and cooked rice cups, in-cup drinks, juice cups, and sterilized products, as well as for frozen food packaging, individually packaged products, and microwaveable food products. In addition, the company offers manual, semi-automatic, and automatic shrink wrapping machines for products of various shapes and sizes. Its products are used in food, cosmetic, medical product, and other consumer goods and industrial packaging industries. Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOPP.BK.summary: Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic films, stickers, laminate tubes, and packaging products in Thailand. The company offers plastic films, such as POF shrink films, skin vacuum films, cast polypropylene (CPP) films, metallized films, stretch films, blown linear low density polypropylene films, CPP breathable films, films for lamination, and protection films, as well as oriented polypropylene heat sealable films. It also provides CPP peels for PP cups, such as jelly, pudding, and fruit dessert cups; and cooked rice cups, in-cup drinks, juice cups, and sterilized products, as well as for frozen food packaging, individually packaged products, and microwaveable food products. In addition, the company offers manual, semi-automatic, and automatic shrink wrapping machines for products of various shapes and sizes. Its products are used in food, cosmetic, medical product, and other consumer goods and industrial packaging industries. Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPAC-R.BK.summary: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products in Thailand, India, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include rigid plastic packaging materials, containers, plastic-wares, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, homecare, personal care, and instrument sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPAC.BK.summary: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products in Thailand, India, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include rigid plastic packaging materials, containers, plastic-wares, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, homecare, personal care, and instrument sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPBI-R.BK.summary: TPBI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic bags and other types of packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic bags, such as loop and tape handle, flat and satchel, block and bottom, die cut, SOS, and fashion bags; woven, jute, and hybrid bags; piping bags for the use in whipping up pastries, cake, and other confectioneries; vest carrier/T-shirt bags, bio-compostable bags, and fruits and vegetables bags that are used in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; garbage bags for garbage handling in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; and LDPE zipper/food storage bags that are used in food protection, moisture, reusable, and resealable for food items. The company also manufactures multilayer blown films, including barrier films, which are used as a packaging for fresh food; lamination films for using in flexible packaging for food products; and stretch hoods and shrink films. In addition, it offers flexible packaging for frozen food, ready-to-eat food, and others in various package types; and mailing and reusable bags. Further, the company provides services for molding, cutting, and film-blowing for plastic bags; produces machines for plastic bags production; produces and distributes paper cups and bowls; and trades in paper and plastic packaging products. Additionally, it offers hygiene products, such as disposable masks, alcohol sprays, hand sanitizers, infrared forehead thermometers, and isolation medical waste bags; digital printing services; and plastic pellet compounds for production of various plastic products. TPBI Public Company Limited also exports its products to Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Plastic Bags Industries Co., Ltd. TPBI Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TPBI.BK.summary: TPBI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic bags and other types of packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic bags, such as loop and tape handle, flat and satchel, block and bottom, die cut, SOS, and fashion bags; woven, jute, and hybrid bags; piping bags for the use in whipping up pastries, cake, and other confectioneries; vest carrier/T-shirt bags, bio-compostable bags, and fruits and vegetables bags that are used in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; garbage bags for garbage handling in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; and LDPE zipper/food storage bags that are used in food protection, moisture, reusable, and resealable for food items. In addition, it offers flexible packaging for frozen food, ready-to-eat food, and others in various package types; and mailing and reusable bags. Further, the company provides services for molding, cutting, and film-blowing for plastic bags; produces machines for plastic bags production; produces and distributes paper cups and bowls; and trades in paper and plastic packaging products. Additionally, it offers hygiene products, such as disposable masks, alcohol sprays, hand sanitizers, infrared forehead thermometers, and isolation medical waste bags; digital printing services; and plastic pellet compounds for production of various plastic products. TPBI Public Company Limited also exports its products to Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Plastic Bags Industries Co., Ltd. TPBI Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TPLAS-R.BK.long_name: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited
TPLAS-R.BK.summary: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic bags and food wrapping films in Thailand. Its products include polypropylene, high-density polyetehylene, and T-shirt high density polyethylene bags, as well as side gusseted products and PVC cling films. Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) markets its products under the Makrook brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TPLAS.BK.long_name: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited
TPLAS.BK.summary: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic bags and food wrapping films in Thailand. Its products include polypropylene, high-density polyetehylene, and T-shirt high density polyethylene bags, as well as side gusseted products and PVC cling films. Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) markets its products under the Makrook brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TPP-R.BK.long_name: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited
TPP-R.BK.summary: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes box packaging products in Thailand. The company offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TPP.BK.long_name: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited
TPP.BK.summary: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes box packaging products in Thailand. The company offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.
